account.onlyPrimaryTimeInSidebar: Only count the working time of the primary account in the sidebar
account.whichAccountToAdd: Which account do you want to add?

login.description: Please click the button below to connect your Jira account with Chronos.

modals.accountLogoutHeadline: You are about to remove an account
modals.accountLogoutText: Unsynchronized working times of the account will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
modals.recoverWorklogsText: Your new account has old saved worklogs. Do you want to recover them?
modals.startTimerInFutureHeadline: You are about to start a timer in the future
modals.startTimerInFutureText: This will modify a worklog in the future. Are you sure you want to continue?
modals.startTimerInPastHeadline: You are about to start a timer in the past
modals.startTimerInPastText: This will modify a worklog in the past. Are you sure you want to continue?

newFeaturesModal.body1: From now on you can add multiple accounts from different workspaces.
newFeaturesModal.body2: You can also set a primary account and e.g. configure that only its times are counted in the total time in the sidebar.
newFeaturesModal.headline: Connect multiple accounts

noWorklogs: No worklogs for this day yet

notifications.infoText: On workdays you receive a notification if you have no or unpublished worklogs for today.
notifications.noPermission: It seems like Chronos doesn't have the necessary permissions to send you notifications. Go to System Settings > Notifications and enable notifications for Chronos for Jira.
notifications.trackingReminderNoTimesText: You did not submit your worklogs for today yet.
notifications.trackingReminderUnpublishedTimesText: You have unpublished worklogs for today.

worklogs.olderThan1Week: Only worklogs of the last 7 days are loaded.
worklogs.olderThanXWeeks: Only worklogs of the last {{weeks}} weeks are loaded.
worklogs.olderThanXMonths: Only worklogs of the last {{months}} months are loaded.
worklogs.changeLimit: You can change this limit in the settings.
worklogs.warningWhenEditingOtherDays: Show warning when editing worklogs from other days

worklogsSyncPeriod.label: Sync period
worklogsSyncPeriod.note: A longer period can significantly increase the sync time, especially for accounts with many issues.
